Title: Heart of a Giant
Description:
There are various giants within the Dragon Isles that are rumored to contain beautiful gems at their core. We normally don't hunt the creatures of the Isles for treasures, but these giants have caused quite a bit of havoc.

We may as well collect these gems in the process of clearing out the destructive giants.
ObjectivesText: Gather 5 Giant Cores from the mountain, ice, or molten giants of the Dragon Isles for Temnaayu of the Iskaara Tuskarr.
